CustomField.formula: DATE( year(SBQQ__StartDate__c) + floor((month(SBQQ__StartDate__c) + SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c )/12) + if(and(month(SBQQ__StartDate__c)=12,SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c >=12),-1,0) , if( mod( month(SBQQ__StartDate__c) + SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c , 12 ) = 0, 12 , mod( month(SBQQ__StartDate__c) + SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c , 12 )) , min( day(SBQQ__StartDate__c), case( max( mod( month(SBQQ__StartDate__c) + SBQQ__SubscriptionTerm__c , 12 ) , 1), 9,30, 4,30, 6,30, 11,30, 2,28, 31 ) ) ) - 1
CustomField.label: Latest end date quote (Formula)
